nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.30.0 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.30.0 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.30.0

nerdctl push --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.29.4
nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.28.9 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.28.9 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.28.9
